text: Hi everyone, does anyone have experience with captcha design? As soon as I turn captcha on, the design created within webflow gets lost and transits back to its original HubSpot form. Any got a clue?

Hi Team,

I'm facing an issue. As you all know, HubSpot allows us to add custom modules to the body of our blog post content. However, Google Search Console considers this as a structured data error.

Google has indexed the page, but it mentions structured data issues. If anyone has experienced this error before or knows of a solution, please shed some light on it.
